ground_truth: He leaves the house and heads towards the light while the old man is wandering up to the house carrying a lit torch. He opens the front door, and inside it is just as dark. He begins climbing the stairs, hearing whispers and hushed voices coming from upstairs. The old man waits outside the room where the conversation is taking place and listens on as a snake slithers past him into the room. Wormtail stands in the doorway and looks at the old man, who looks terrified. A loud spell is cast and Harry wakes up in a flash of panic, flustered and still panicking. Hermione goes over to Ron's bed and they shake hands, then walk up the hill. The camera homes in on a boot on top of the hillside and everyone is in a circle, putting their hands on the boot. Harry rushes over and puts his hand on the boot, and there's a white flash, suddenly sending them all flying through the air. Everyone cheers as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys crash to the ground with a thump while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric come down more gracefully. Cedric helps Harry to his feet, and they walk across the field, seeing a massive crowd gathered and cheering, with tents set up all over. They walk into the crowd, taking in the sights and approach a small tent, where Amos and Cedric separate and walk off. They enter the tent, which is many times bigger on the inside than the outside. They take their feet off the table and put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past. The scene pans up the hillside onto a large stadium with a huge number of floors where the Weasleys and Harry are finding their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk below them. The ceremonies begin with balloons flying and fireworks going off. Five green and white figures fly through the air on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering leprechaun appears in the sky and starts dancing, making everyone excited. Five red figures appear this time, with one performing a stunt on a broom and another one appearing on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the crowd, and Harry joins in. Suddenly, the crowd is panicked and rushing all over, and Harry is trampled unconscious. The crowds have all gone, and a man walks through the rubble kicking at things. He casts a spell that causes a bright flash, and a large ghostly skull forms in the sky with a snake crawling from it. The man grins evilly, clearly demented, as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there, leading Harry to run. They look at the monstrous thing in the sky as Harry holds his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He departs the dwelling and proceeds towards the illumination while the elderly gentleman is roaming up to the residence bearing a lit brand. He unlocks the entry portal, and within it is just as dim. He starts ascending the steps, perceiving murmurs and muted voices originating from upstairs. The elderly gentleman lingers outside the chamber where the dialogue is occurring and listens on as a serpent glides past him into the chamber. Wormtail stands in the threshold and gazes at the elderly gentleman, who appears horrified. A deafening enchantment is cast, and Harry awakens in a burst of alarm, agitated and still panicking. Hermione moves over to Ron's bed and they clasp hands, then stroll up the incline. The camera focuses in on a footwear atop the hillside and everyone is in a circle, placing their hands on the footwear. Harry dashes over and places his hand on the footwear, and there's a bright flash, suddenly dispatching them all soaring through the atmosphere. Everyone exults as Harry, Hermione, and the youthful Weasleys descend to the earth with a thud while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric descend more elegantly. Cedric assists Harry to his feet, and they traverse the meadow, observing a vast throng gathered and exclaiming, with canopies erected all over. They proceed into the throng, absorbing the vistas and approach a small shelter, where Amos and Cedric part and saunter off. They enter the shelter, which is many times larger on the inside than the exterior. They remove their feet from the table and place them back on immediately as Arthur has strolled past. The scene shifts up the hillside onto a large arena with a huge number of tiers where the Weasleys and Harry are locating their places as Lucius Malfoy and Draco stroll beneath them. The ceremonies commence with balloons flying and pyrotechnics igniting. Five verdant and alabaster figures soar through the atmosphere on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a sparkling leprechaun materializes in the sky and starts cavorting, making everyone exhilarated. Five crimson figures appear this instance, with one executing a feat on a broom and another one appearing on the large display. Viktor Krum salutes to the throng, and Harry participates. Suddenly, the crowd is panicked and scurrying all over, and Harry is trampled senseless. The throngs have all departed, and a man ambles through the debris kicking at items. He casts a spell that causes a luminous flash, and a large spectral skull forms in the sky with a serpent slithering from it. The man grins wickedly, clearly deranged, as Harry stirs and observes him standing there, prompting Harry to flee. They gaze at the monstrous thing in the sky as Harry clutches his head in agony.

The man grins evilly, clearly demented, as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there, leading Harry to run. The monstrous thing in the sky is looked at by them as Harry holds his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He leaves the house and heads toward the light while an old man approaches with a lit torch. Inside, it's equally dark. He climbs the stairs, hearing whispers from above. The old man waits outside the room, listening as a snake slithers past him. Wormtail stands in the doorway, terrifying the old man. A loud spell is cast, and Harry wakes up in panic. Hermione goes to Ron's bed, and they shake hands, then walk up the hill. The camera focuses on a boot on the hillside, and everyone forms a circle, placing their hands on it. Harry rushes over, touches the boot, and a white flash sends them flying through the air. They cheer as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys crash down, while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric land gracefully. test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He leaves the house toward the light as an old man approaches with a lit torch. Inside, it's dark, and he hears whispers upstairs. The old man listens outside a room as a snake slithers in. Wormtail stands in the doorway, terrifying the old man. A loud spell wakes Harry in panic. Hermione and Ron shake hands and walk up the hill. The camera focuses on a boot, and everyone places their hands on it. A white flash sends them flying, and they land with a thump. Cedric helps Harry up, and they walk to a cheering crowd with tents. Amos and Cedric separate at a small tent, which is larger inside. They put their feet back on the table after Arthur passes. The scene shifts to a large stadium where the Weasleys and Harry find seats as Lucius and Draco walk below. Ceremonies begin with balloons, fireworks, and flying figures. A leprechaun dances, exciting everyone. Five red figures appear, one stunts on a broom, and Viktor Krum waves. Suddenly, panic ensues, and Harry is trampled unconscious. A man walks through rubble, casts a spell, and a ghostly skull with a snake forms in the sky. The man grins as Harry stirs, sees him, and runs, holding his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He steps out of the house and begins making his way toward the distant light, while at the same time, the old man is slowly wandering up to the house, carefully carrying a lit torch in his hand. As he opens the front door, he finds that the interior is just as dark as the outside. He starts to ascend the stairs, and as he does so, he hears whispers and hushed voices emanating from the upper floor. The old man pauses outside the room where the conversation is taking place, listening intently, as a snake silently slithers past him and into the room. Wormtail stands ominously in the doorway, casting a glance at the old man, who appears utterly terrified. Suddenly, a loud spell is cast, and Harry jolts awake in a flash of panic, feeling flustered and still in a state of panic. Hermione makes her way over to Ron's bed, and they exchange a handshake before they begin to walk up the hill together. The camera focuses on a boot positioned at the top of the hillside, and everyone gathers in a circle, placing their hands on the boot. Harry rushes over to join them, placing his hand on the boot as well, and there's a brilliant white flash that suddenly sends them all flying through the air. Cheers erupt from everyone as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys crash to the ground with a resounding thump, while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric descend more gracefully. Cedric extends a helping hand to Harry, assisting him to his feet, and together they walk across the field, observing a massive crowd that has gathered, cheering enthusiastically, with tents set up all around. They make their way into the crowd, taking in the vibrant sights, and approach a small tent, where Amos and Cedric part ways and walk off in different directions. Upon entering the tent, they discover that it is many times larger on the inside than it appears from the outside. They take their feet off the table, only to put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past. The scene then pans up the hillside to reveal a large stadium with an impressive number of floors, where the Weasleys and Harry are in the process of finding their seats, while Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk below them. The ceremonies commence with balloons soaring into the sky and fireworks exploding in bursts of color. Five green and white figures fly through the air on their brooms, leaving a vibrant colored trail behind them, as a glittering leprechaun appears in the sky and begins to dance, filling everyone with excitement. This time, five red figures make their appearance, with one performing a daring stunt on a broom and another one appearing on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the crowd, and Harry eagerly joins in. Suddenly, the crowd is thrown into a state of panic, rushing in all directions, and Harry is trampled unconscious in the chaos. The crowds have all dispersed, and a man walks through the rubble, kicking at debris. He casts a spell that results in a bright flash, and a large ghostly skull forms ominously in the sky, with a snake crawling from its mouth. The man grins evilly, his demeanor clearly demented, as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there, prompting Harry to flee. They gaze at the monstrous apparition in the sky as Harry clutches his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: He steps out of the house with deliberate intent and begins making his way toward the distant, flickering light, while simultaneously, the old man is meandering slowly up to the house's entrance, meticulously carrying a lit torch in his aged, trembling hand. As he gingerly opens the front door, he finds that the interior remains as shrouded in darkness as the world outside. He starts to ascend the creaking stairs, and as he carefully does so, he hears soft whispers and hushed voices drifting down from the upper floor. The old man pauses right outside the room where the muted conversation is occurring, listening intently, as a snake silently slithers past him and into the dimly lit room. Wormtail stands with an ominous presence in the doorway, casting a menacing glance at the old man, who appears utterly terrified and frozen in fear. In a sudden, startling moment, a loud spell resonates through the air, and Harry jolts awake, a flash of panic enveloping him, leaving him feeling flustered, overwhelmed, and still gripped by a lingering state of panic. Hermione then makes her way over to Ron's bed, and they engage in a friendly handshake before they begin their journey walking up the hill together. The camera captures a close-up of a boot positioned at the very top of the hillside, and everyone gathers around it in a circle, placing their hands on the boot. Harry rushes over eagerly to join them, placing his hand firmly on the boot as well, and there's a brilliant, dazzling white flash that suddenly propels them all flying through the air. Cheers erupt jubilantly from everyone as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys crash to the ground with a resounding thump, while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric descend with a more graceful landing. Cedric then extends a helping hand to Harry, assisting him to his feet, and together they walk across the expansive field, observing a massive crowd that has gathered, cheering enthusiastically, with colorful tents set up all around. They make their way into the crowd, absorbing the vibrant sights and sounds, and approach a small, unassuming tent, where Amos and Cedric part ways amicably, walking off in different directions. Upon entering the tent, they discover, to their astonishment, that it is many times larger on the inside than it appears from the outside. They take their feet off the table momentarily, only to put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past. The scene then dramatically pans up the hillside to reveal a large stadium boasting an impressive number of floors, where the Weasleys and Harry are in the process of eagerly finding their seats, while Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk purposefully below them. The ceremonies commence grandly with balloons soaring majestically into the sky and fireworks exploding in bursts of vibrant color. Five green and white figures gracefully fly through the air on their brooms, leaving a vibrant colored trail behind them, as a glittering leprechaun spectacularly appears in the sky and begins to dance, filling everyone with excitement and anticipation. This time, five red figures make their dynamic appearance, with one performing a daring stunt on a broom and another one appearing prominently on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves enthusiastically to the crowd, and Harry eagerly joins in, waving back. Suddenly, the crowd is thrown into a chaotic state of panic, rushing frantically in all directions, and Harry is trampled unconscious in the ensuing chaos. The once-crowded scene has dispersed entirely, and a man walks through the debris-strewn rubble, kicking at the remnants. He casts a spell that results in a bright flash, and a large ghostly skull forms ominously in the sky, with a snake ominously crawling from its gaping mouth. The man grins evilly, his demeanor clearly demented and sinister, as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there, prompting Harry to flee in terror. They gaze up at the monstrous apparition in the sky, looming overhead, as Harry clutches his head in excruciating pain.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He steps out of the house, closing the door behind him, and begins to make his way toward the distant light, each step deliberate and purposeful. Meanwhile, an old man, with a cautious yet determined gait, approaches the house, his hand gripping a lit torch that flickers in the dimness. As he reaches the front door, he pushes it open, revealing an interior shrouded in darkness, mirroring the night outside. He steps inside, allowing his eyes to adjust to the gloom, and starts ascending the staircase, each footfall echoing softly. As he climbs, he becomes aware of whispers and hushed voices drifting down from above, their source hidden but unmistakably present. Outside the room where the murmured conversation unfolds, the old man pauses, straining to catch the words, while a snake silently slithers past him, slipping into the room with an eerie grace. Wormtail stands in the doorway, casting a glance at the old man, whose face is etched with terror. Suddenly, a loud spell reverberates through the air, jolting Harry awake in a flash of panic. His heart races as he sits up, flustered and still caught in the grip of fear. Meanwhile, Hermione crosses the room to Ron's bed, where they exchange a firm handshake, a silent agreement passing between them. Together, they make their way up the hill, their steps synchronized. The camera focuses on a boot perched atop the hillside, around which everyone gathers in a circle, each person reaching out to place a hand on it. Harry hurries over, extending his hand to join the others on the boot, and in an instant, a white flash envelops them, propelling them through the air. As they soar, cheers erupt from the group, and Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys land with a thump, while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric descend with more grace. Cedric offers Harry a hand, helping him to his feet, and together they traverse the field, their eyes taking in the massive crowd that has gathered, tents dotting the landscape. They weave through the throng, absorbing the vibrant atmosphere, and approach a small tent where Amos and Cedric part ways, disappearing into the crowd. Entering the tent, they find it surprisingly spacious, its interior far larger than its exterior suggests. They settle in, briefly lifting their feet off the table, only to replace them as Arthur walks by. The scene shifts, panning up the hillside to reveal a sprawling stadium with numerous floors, where the Weasleys and Harry locate their seats, observing as Lucius Malfoy and Draco pass below. The ceremonies commence with a burst of balloons and fireworks, filling the sky with color. Five green and white figures streak through the air on brooms, leaving a vibrant trail, while a glittering leprechaun materializes above, dancing and stirring excitement among the spectators. Next, five red figures appear, one executing a daring stunt on a broom, another magnified on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the crowd, prompting Harry to join in the enthusiastic response. Suddenly, chaos erupts as panic spreads through the crowd, people rushing in all directions, and Harry is caught in the tumult, trampled into unconsciousness. When he regains awareness, the once-bustling area is deserted, and a man strides through the debris, kicking at remnants. He casts a spell, unleashing a bright flash that conjures a large, ghostly skull in the sky, a snake slithering from its mouth. The man grins with a twisted satisfaction, his demeanor unhinged, as Harry, stirring from his daze, witnesses the scene and instinctively flees. He pauses to gaze at the monstrous apparition in the sky, clutching his head in pain as the reality of the situation sinks in.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: He leaves the house and heads toward the light while an old man approaches carrying a lit torch. Entering the dark interior, he climbs the stairs, hearing whispers from above. The old man listens outside the room where the conversation occurs as a snake slithers past him. Wormtail stands in the doorway, looking at the terrified old man. A loud spell is cast, and Harry wakes up in a panic. Hermione goes to Ron's bed, and they shake hands before walking up the hill. The camera focuses on a boot atop the hillside, where everyone gathers in a circle, placing their hands on it. Harry rushes to join them, and a white flash sends them flying through the air. They cheer as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys crash to the ground, while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric land more gracefully. Cedric helps Harry up, and they walk across a field filled with a massive, cheering crowd and tents. Approaching a small tent, Amos and Cedric separate and walk off. Inside, the tent is much larger than it appears from the outside. They briefly remove their feet from the table as Arthur passes by. The scene shifts to a large stadium where the Weasleys and Harry find their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk below. The ceremonies begin with balloons, fireworks, and five green and white figures flying on brooms, leaving a colored trail. A glittering leprechaun appears, dancing and exciting the crowd. Five red figures follow, with one performing a stunt and another appearing on a large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the crowd, and Harry joins in. Suddenly, panic ensues, and Harry is trampled unconscious. As the crowds disperse, a man walks through the rubble, casting a spell that creates a ghostly skull with a snake in the sky. The man grins evilly as Harry stirs, witnessing the scene and running away, clutching his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He leaves the house, a place that has long been rumored to be haunted, and heads towards the light while the old man, likely the caretaker known for his nightly rounds, is wandering up to the house carrying a lit torch. He opens the front door, and inside it is just as dark, reminiscent of the tales of eerie silence that locals speak of. He begins climbing the stairs, hearing whispers and hushed voices rumored to be the ghosts of the former residents coming from upstairs. The old man waits outside the room where the conversation is taking place, listening intently as a snake, often associated with dark magic due to its symbolism in various mythologies, slithers past him into the room. Wormtail, a follower notorious for his treacherous past, stands in the doorway and looks at the old man, who looks terrified. A loud spell, possibly from the dark arts, is cast and Harry wakes up in a flash of panic, flustered and still panicking, as if escaping from a nightmare. Hermione goes over to Ron's bed and they shake hands, a gesture of mutual support and friendship, then walk up the hill. The camera homes in on a boot on top of the hillside, known to be a Portkey, and everyone is in a circle, putting their hands on the boot. Harry rushes over and puts his hand on the boot, and there's a white flash, suddenly sending them all flying through the air to their destination. Everyone cheers as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys crash to the ground with a thump while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric, skilled at using Portkeys, come down more gracefully. Cedric helps Harry to his feet, embodying the spirit of sportsmanship, and they walk across the field, seeing a massive crowd gathered and cheering for the Quidditch World Cup, with tents set up all over. They walk into the crowd, taking in the sights of the international wizarding community, and approach a small tent, which, due to its enchantment, is many times bigger on the inside than the outside. Amos and Cedric separate and walk off, likely to meet fellow enthusiasts. They take their feet off the table and put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past, obeying his fatherly authority. The scene pans up the hillside onto a large stadium, the venue of the world-famous Quidditch match, with a huge number of floors where the Weasleys and Harry are finding their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco, known for their ties to the dark arts, walk below them. The ceremonies begin with balloons flying and fireworks going off, showcasing wizarding entertainment at its finest. Five green and white figures, representing the Irish Quidditch team, fly through the air on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering leprechaun, an iconic symbol of Irish folklore, appears in the sky and starts dancing, making everyone excited. Five red figures appear this time, the Bulgarian team, with one performing a stunt on a broom and another one, Viktor Krum, a famous Seeker, appearing on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the crowd, and Harry joins in, excited to see his idol. Suddenly, the crowd is panicked and rushing all over, and Harry is trampled unconscious by the panicked stampede. The crowds have all gone, and a man, possibly a Death Eater, walks through the rubble kicking at things. He casts a spell that causes a bright flash, and a large ghostly skull with a snake crawling from it, known as the Dark Mark, forms in the sky. The man grins evilly, clearly demented and reveling in chaos, as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there, leading Harry to run in fear. They look at the monstrous thing in the sky as Harry holds his head in pain, the scar that connects him to darker forces throbbing with intensity.

Harry rushes over and puts his hand on the boot and there is a white flash suddenly sending them all flying through the air. They walk into the crowd taking in the sights and approach a small tent where Amos and Cedric separate and walk off. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. They enter the tent which is many times bigger on the inside than the outside. They take their feet off the table and put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past. The scene pans up the hillside onto a large stadium with a huge number of floors where the Weasleys and Harry are finding their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk below them. The ceremonies begin with balloons flying and fireworks going off. Five green and white figures fly through the air on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering leprechaun appears in the sky and starts dancing making everyone excited. Five red figures appear this time with one performing a stunt on a broom and another one appearing on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the crowd and Harry joins in. Suddenly the crowd is panicked and rushing all over and Harry is trampled unconscious. The crowds have all gone and a man walks through the rubble kicking at things. He casts a spell that causes a bright flash and a large ghostly skull forms in the sky with a snake crawling from it. The man grins evilly clearly demented as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there leading Harry to run. They look at the monstrous thing in the sky as Harry holds his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: He leaves the house and heads towards the light while the old man is wandering up to the house carrying a lit torch. He opens the front door and inside it is just as dark. He begins climbing the stairs hearing whispers and hushed voices coming from upstairs. The old man waits outside the room where the conversation is taking place and listens on as a snake slithers past him into the room. Wormtail stands in the doorway and looks at the old man who looks terrified. A loud spell is cast and Harry wakes up in a flash of panic flustered and still panicking. Hermione goes over to Ron's bed and they shake hands then walk up the hill. The camera homes in on a boot on top of the hillside and everyone is in a circle putting their hands on the boot. Harry rushes over and puts his hand on the boot and there is a white flash suddenly sending them all flying through the air. Everyone cheers as Harry Hermione and the young Weasleys crash to the ground with a thump while Arthur Amos and Cedric come down more gracefully. Cedric helps Harry to his feet and they walk across the field seeing a massive crowd gathered and cheering with tents set up all over. They walk into the crowd taking in the sights and approach a small tent where Amos and Cedric separate and walk off. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. They enter the tent which is many times bigger on the inside than the outside. They take their feet off the table and put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past. The scene pans up the hillside onto a large stadium with a huge number of floors where the Weasleys and Harry are finding their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk below them. The ceremonies begin with balloons flying and fireworks going off. Five green and white figures fly through the air on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering leprechaun appears in the sky and starts dancing making everyone excited. Five red figures appear this time with one performing a stunt on a broom and another one appearing on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the crowd and Harry joins in. Suddenly the crowd is panicked and rushing all over and Harry is trampled unconscious. The crowds have all gone and a man walks through the rubble kicking at things. He casts a spell that causes a bright flash and a large ghostly skull forms in the sky with a snake crawling from it. test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: The pigeon leaves the house and heads towards the light while the squirrel is wandering up to the house carrying a lit torch. The pigeon opens the front door, and inside it is just as dark. The pigeon begins climbing the stairs, hearing whispers and hushed voices coming from upstairs. The squirrel waits outside the room where the conversation is taking place and listens on as a rabbit slithers past him into the room. The caterpillar stands in the doorway and looks at the squirrel, who looks terrified. A loud spell is cast and the dog wakes up in a flash of panic, flustered and still panicking. The dolphin goes over to the bear's bed and they shake hands, then walk up the hill. The camera homes in on a boot on top of the hillside and everyone is in a circle, putting their hands on the boot. The dog rushes over and puts his hand on the boot, and there's a white flash, suddenly sending them all flying through the air. Everyone cheers as the dog, the dolphin, and the young pandas crash to the ground with a thump while the giraffe, the lion, and the eagle come down more gracefully. The eagle helps the dog to his feet, and they walk across the field, seeing a massive crowd gathered and cheering, with tents set up all over. They walk into the crowd, taking in the sights and approach a small tent, where the lion and the eagle separate and walk off. They enter the tent, which is many times bigger on the inside than the outside. They take their feet off the table and put them back on as soon as the giraffe has walked past. The scene pans up the hillside onto a large stadium with a huge number of floors where the pandas and the dog are finding their seats as the wolf and the fox walk below them. The ceremonies begin with balloons flying and fireworks going off. Five green and white figures fly through the air on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering unicorn appears in the sky and starts dancing, making everyone excited. Five red figures appear this time, with one performing a stunt on a broom and another one appearing on the large screen. The kangaroo waves to the crowd, and the dog joins in. Suddenly, the crowd is panicked and rushing all over, and the dog is trampled unconscious. The crowds have all gone, and a butterfly walks through the rubble kicking at things. The butterfly casts a spell that causes a bright flash, and a large ghostly skull forms in the sky with a snake crawling from it. The butterfly grins evilly, clearly demented, as the dog stirs and witnesses the butterfly standing there, leading the dog to run. They look at the monstrous thing in the sky as the dog holds his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: He leaves the greenhouse and heads towards the lantern while the old man is wandering up to the greenhouse carrying a lit lantern. He opens the side gate, and inside it is just as dim. He begins climbing the ladder, hearing murmurs and muted tunes coming from above. The old man waits outside the shed where the music is coming from and listens on as a cat slinks past him into the shed. Wormtail stands in the doorway and looks at the old man, who looks alarmed. A loud sound is made and Harry wakes up in a flash of distress, flustered and still anxious. Hermione goes over to Ron's hammock and they shake hands, then walk up the path. The camera homes in on a helmet on top of the ridge and everyone is in a circle, putting their hands on the helmet. Harry rushes over and puts his hand on the helmet, and there's a white flash, suddenly sending them all soaring through the air. Everyone cheers as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys crash to the forest floor with a thump while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric come down more gracefully. Cedric helps Harry to his feet, and they walk across the meadow, seeing a massive herd gathered and cheering, with cabins set up all over. They walk into the herd, taking in the sights and approach a small cabin, where Amos and Cedric separate and walk off. They enter the cabin, which is many times larger on the inside than the outside. They take their feet off the bench and put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past. The scene pans up the ridge onto a large amphitheater with a huge number of tiers where the Weasleys and Harry are finding their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk beneath them. The ceremonies begin with doves flying and flares going off. Five green and white figures fly through the air on their wings leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering sprite appears in the sky and starts twirling, making everyone excited. Five red figures appear this time, with one performing a stunt on a wing and another one appearing on the large screen. Viktor Krum waves to the herd, and Harry joins in. Suddenly, the herd is panicked and rushing all over, and Harry is knocked unconscious. The herd has all gone, and a man walks through the debris kicking at things. He casts a charm that causes a bright flash, and a large ghostly visage forms in the sky with a lizard crawling from it. The man grins evilly, clearly demented, as Harry stirs and notices him standing there, leading Harry to sprint. They look at the monstrous thing in the sky as Harry holds his head in pain.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He exits the house and glides towards the light while the old man is skipping up to the house juggling a lit torch. He shuts the front door, and inside it is just as bright. He begins descending the stairs, overhearing shouts and loud voices coming from upstairs. The old man sleeps outside the room where the conversation is taking place and tunes in as a snake jumps past him into the room. Wormtail dances in the doorway and glares at the old man, who looks amused. A soft song is sung and Harry dozes off in a flash of calm, relaxed and steadily drifting. Hermione runs over to Ron's bed and they high-five, then jog up the hill. The camera zooms out on a boot on top of the hillside and everyone is in a circle, clapping their hands on the boot. Harry strolls over and kicks the boot, and there's a red flash, suddenly sending them all gently floating through the air. Everyone whispers as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys drift to the ground with a gentle touch while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric come down with a skip. Cedric pulls Harry to his feet, and they wander across the field, noticing a tiny crowd scattered and whispering, with tents packed up all over. They walk away from the crowd, examining the sights and avoid a small tent, where Amos and Cedric pause and jump off. They exit the tent, which is ten times smaller on the inside than the outside. They take their feet off the floor and put them back on as soon as Arthur has skipped past. The scene zooms down the hillside onto a small stadium with a tiny number of floors where the Weasleys and Harry are losing their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco wander above them. The ceremonies end with balloons dropping and fireworks fizzling out. Five red and blue figures walk through the air on their brooms leaving a black trail behind them as a glittering leprechaun appears in the sky and starts sleeping, making everyone sleepy. Five blue figures disappear this time, with one performing a nap on a broom and another one disappearing from the large screen. Viktor Krum hides from the crowd, and Harry claps lightly. Suddenly, the crowd is calm and standing still, and Harry is lifting up energetically. The crowds have all gathered, and a man dances through the rubble singing at things. He hides a spell that causes a dim glow, and a small friendly skull forms in the sky with a snake napping from it. The man laughs joyfully, clearly amused, as Harry sleeps and imagines him standing there, leading Harry to skip. They wave at the peaceful thing in the sky as Harry taps his head in relief.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The cat leaves the garage and heads towards the lantern while the young girl is wandering up to the garage carrying a shiny apple. The cat opens the back gate, and inside it is just as quiet. The cat begins climbing the ladder, hearing rustling and soft sounds coming from downstairs. The young girl waits outside the window where the discussion is taking place and listens on as an owl flies past her into the window. Teacup stands in the corridor and looks at the young girl, who looks amused. A loud horn is blown and Jack wakes up in a flash of wonder, bewildered and still wondering. Luna goes over to Neville's couch and they shake antennas, then walk up the staircase. The laptop zooms in on a spoon on top of the rooftop and everyone is in a spiral, putting their elbows on the spoon. Jack speeds over and puts his elbow on the spoon, and there's a green flash, suddenly sending them all soaring through the ocean. Everyone laughs as Jack, Luna, and the tiny Longbottoms splash to the shore with a splash while Ned, Amy, and Cedric come down more swiftly. Cedric helps Jack to his hands, and they stroll across the meadow, seeing a tiny crowd gathered and laughing, with chairs set up all over. They stroll into the crowd, capturing the smells and approach a narrow chair, where Amy and Cedric detach and trot off. They enter the chair, which is many times smaller on the inside than the outside. They take their hands off the shelf and put them back on as soon as Ned has walked past. The scene pans up the rooftop onto a tiny auditorium with a small number of windows where the Longbottoms and Jack are finding their spots as Severus Snape and Draco skip below them. The festivities begin with hats soaring and balloons popping off. Five blue and orange lions soar through the ocean on their kites leaving a sparkling trail behind them as a shimmering mermaid appears in the cloud and starts singing, making everyone happy. Five yellow horses appear this time, with one performing a somersault on a kite and another one appearing on the tiny nest. Byron Fang waves to the cloud, and Jack joins in. Suddenly, the cloud is excited and leaping all over, and Jack is trampled awake. The clouds have all vanished, and a dog skips through the hay kicking at toys. It casts a shout that causes a dark flash, and a tiny blurry star forms in the cloud with a worm crawling from it. The dog laughs joyously, clearly delighted, as Jack stirs and witnesses it standing there, leading Jack to leap. They glance at the tiny thing in the cloud as Jack holds his leg in delight.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: She exits the cave and meanders towards the beacon while the young woman is strolling up to the cave juggling a lit lamp. She shuts the back door, and outside it is just as bright. She descends the ladder, detecting murmurs and gentle melodies drifting from downstairs. The young woman dances outside the space where the performance is happening and watches as a cat scampers past her into the space. Snape stands in the archway and grins at the young woman, who looks exhilarated. A quiet song is played and Draco dozes off in a flash of calm, collected and still relaxed. Luna skips over to Ginny's desk and they exchange glances, then skip down the valley. The camera focuses in on a hat on top of the valley and everyone is in a cluster, placing their feet on the hat. Draco strolls over and places his foot on the hat, and there's a dark flash, suddenly sending them all spinning through the clouds. Everyone applauds as Draco, Luna, and the young Grangers land softly while Molly, Alastor, and Fleur float down more awkwardly. Fleur assists Draco to his feet, and they skip across the canyon, witnessing a tiny group assembled and clapping, with lanterns set up all over. They skip into the group, absorbing the sights and approach a large lantern, where Alastor and Fleur reconnect and skip away. They exit the lantern, which is many times smaller on the outside than the inside. They keep their eyes on the ceiling and avert them as soon as Molly has skipped past. The scene shifts down the valley onto a small theater with a tiny number of levels where the Grangers and Draco are vacating their seats as Bellatrix Lestrange and Grimlock fly above them. The rituals escalate with doves gliding and confetti falling down. Five blue and yellow spirits glide beneath the sea on their carpets trailing a misty path behind them as a shimmering unicorn materializes in the ocean and begins singing, making everyone joyful. Five yellow spirits disappear this time, with one sketching a picture on a carpet and another one vanishing from the tiny painting. Luna Lovegood nods to the sea, and Draco abstains. Gradually, the sea is calm and flowing nowhere, and Luna is floating conscious. The waves have all stilled, and a child skips beneath the ripples whispering about things. She whispers a lullaby that prompts a quiet echo, and a tiny ethereal dolphin forms in the ocean with a rat swimming from it. The child giggles playfully, seemingly delighted, as Luna stirs and watches her skipping there, prompting Luna to skip. They gaze at the celestial thing in the ocean as Luna clutches her heart with peace.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He departs the barn and wanders towards the glow while the young boy is ambling up to the barn brandishing an unlit lantern. He pushes open the garage door, and inside it is just as bright. He starts descending the ladder, feeling vibrations and muffled music emanating from downstairs. The young boy waits inside the hallway where the celebration is occurring and watches on as a rabbit hops past him into the hallway. Wormtail stands in the corridor and gazes at the young boy, who looks amused. A gentle melody is played and Harry dozes off in a puff of relief, calm and still dreaming. Hermione goes over to Ron's cot and they fist-bump, then stroll down the valley. The scene zooms in on a shoe at the bottom of the valley and everyone is in a square, placing their feet on the shoe. Harry dashes over and places his foot on the shoe, and there's a black flash, abruptly sending them all gliding through the air. Everyone laughs as Harry, Hermione, and the young Weasleys glide onto the ground with a bump while Arthur, Amos, and Cedric land more clumsily. Cedric assists Harry to his knees, and they wander across the park, noticing a small group gathered and whispering, with chairs set up all over. They wander into the group, examining the sights and approach a gigantic chair, where Amos and Cedric unite and walk away. They exit the chair, which is many times smaller on the outside than the inside. They take their hands off the bench and put them back on as soon as Arthur has strolled past. The scene shifts down the valley onto a small courtyard with a few number of carpets where the Weasleys and Harry are losing their places as Lucius Malfoy and Draco hover above them. The festivities begin with kites soaring and sparklers fizzling. Five purple and orange animals float through the air on their carpets leaving a sparkling stream behind them as a shimmering unicorn appears in the clouds and starts singing, making everyone amazed. Five blue animals appear this time, with one executing a trick on a carpet and another one appearing on the tiny screen. Viktor Krum nods to the group, and Harry joins in. Suddenly, the group is calm and standing still, and Harry is whisked conscious. The group has all returned, and a woman dances through the remains inspecting at things. She sings a melody that causes a dim glow, and a tiny lively dragon forms on the ground with a mouse crawling from it. The woman smiles sweetly, clearly delighted, as Harry awakens and observes her relaxing there, leading Harry to sit. They squint at the delightful thing in the clouds as Harry pats his shoulder in relief.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She enters the garden and swims towards the shadow while the young woman is skiing down to the garden dragging a lit lantern. She shuts the back gate, and outside it is just as bright. She starts descending the ladder, tasting shouts and loud songs coming from downstairs. The young woman leaps inside the vehicle where the argument is happening and watches on as a cat hops past her into the vehicle. Snape stands in the hallway and stares at the young woman, who looks thrilled. A quiet dance is performed, and Neville falls asleep in a burst of calm, soothed and no longer panicked. Luna skips over to Ginny's couch and they wave goodbye, then slide down the riverbank. The microphone focuses on a hat at the bottom of the valley and everyone is in a triangle, placing their feet on the hat. Neville skips over and places his foot on the hat, and there's a red burst, suddenly hurling them all swimming through the ocean. Everyone applauds as Neville, Luna, and the elderly Grangers swim to the shore with a splash while Molly, Sirius, and Fleur drift down more smoothly. Fleur pulls Neville to his hands, and they float across the pool, spotting a tiny group gathered and applauding, with hammocks propped up all around. They drift into the group, absorbing the sounds and approach a huge hammock, where Sirius and Fleur merge and drift away. They enter the hammock, which is many times smaller on the outside than the inside. They place their heads off the chair and put them back on as soon as Molly has skated by. The scene hovers up the riverbank onto a tiny cafe with a small number of tables where the Grangers and Neville are losing their feet as Bellatrix Lestrange and Crabbe float above them. The carnivals end with marbles dropping and kites going up. Five blue and yellow animals sprint through the water on their nibs leaving a colorful river behind them as a shimmering pixie vanishes from the ocean and stops sleeping, making everyone nervous. Five purple animals vanish this time, with one painting a picture on a nib and another one vanishing from the tiny table. Sybill Trelawney hides from the group, and Neville backs away. Suddenly, the group is calm and resting under, and Neville is lifted conscious. The groups have all stayed, and a child sails through the calm playing at objects. She creates a dance that has a dark shadow, and a tiny friendly heart disappears in the ocean with a rabbit sleeping on it. The child cries happily, clearly lucid, as Neville sleeps and dreams of her dancing there, leading Neville to whisper. They fly at the beautiful creature in the ocean as Neville bows his hand in peace.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: He exits the house as an old man with a torch approaches. Inside, darkness abounds as he climbs the stairs, hearing whispers. Outside the room, a snake slithers by, and Wormtail notices the terrified old man before a spell is cast. Harry wakes in panic, then joins Hermione and Ron. They gather in a circle around a boot, a flash sends them flying through the air. Cheering ensues as they land, with Arthur, Amos, and Cedric arriving gracefully. Cedric helps Harry, and they observe the tents and crowd. Inside an expansive tent, they settle in as ceremonies begin with flying figures and a dancing leprechaun. Viktor Krum waves, exciting Harry. Suddenly, the crowd panics, and Harry is knocked unconscious. Once the crowds disperse, a man casts a spell, forming a skull in the sky. The evil man grins as Harry, in pain, runs away.

their hands on the boot  Suddenly the crowd is panicked and rushing all over and Harry is trampled unconscious  The ceremonies begin with balloons flying and fireworks going off  Five green and white figures fly through the air on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering leprechaun appears in the sky and starts dancing making everyone excited  They look at the monstrous thing in the sky as Harry holds his head in pain Viktor Krum waves to the crowd and Harry joins in  Everyone cheers as Harry Hermione and the young Weasleys crash to the ground with a thump while Arthur Amos and Cedric come down more gracefully  They walk into the crowd taking in the sights and approach a small tent where Amos and Cedric separate and walk off  The man grins evilly clearly demented as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there leading Harry to run  The scene pans up the hillside onto a large stadium with a huge number of floors where the Weasleys and Harry are finding their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk below them  Five red figures appear this time with one performing a stunt on a broom and another one appearing on the large screen  He opens the front door and inside it is just as dark  The old man waits outside the room where the conversation is taking place and listens on as a snake slithers past him into the room  The crowds have all gone and a man walks through the rubble kicking at things  Hermione goes over to Ron's bed and they shake hands then walk up the hill  Wormtail stands in the doorway and looks at the old man who looks terrified  Harry rushes over and puts his hand on the boot and there's a white flash suddenly sending them all flying through the air  Cedric helps Harry to his feet and they walk across the field seeing a massive crowd gathered and cheering with tents set up all over  They take their feet off the table and put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past  A loud spell is cast and Harry wakes up in a flash of panic flustered and still panicking  He leaves the house and heads towards the light while the old man is wandering up to the house carrying a lit torch

test_cases.name: Rotate Half Paragraph
test_cases.description: They enter the tent which is many times bigger on the inside than the outside  They take their feet off the table and put them back on as soon as Arthur has walked past  The scene pans up the hillside onto a large stadium with a huge number of floors where the Weasleys and Harry are finding their seats as Lucius Malfoy and Draco walk below them  The ceremonies begin with balloons flying and fireworks going off  Five green and white figures fly through the air on their brooms leaving a colored trail behind them as a glittering leprechaun appears in the sky and starts dancing making everyone excited  Five red figures appear this time with one performing a stunt on a broom and another one appearing on the large screen  Viktor Krum waves to the crowd and Harry joins in  Suddenly the crowd is panicked and rushing all over and Harry is trampled unconscious  The crowds have all gone and a man walks through the rubble kicking at things  He casts a spell that causes a bright flash and a large ghostly skull forms in the sky with a snake crawling from it  The man grins evilly clearly demented as Harry stirs and witnesses him standing there leading Harry to run  They look at the monstrous thing in the sky as Harry holds his head in pain He leaves the house and heads towards the light while the old man is wandering up to the house carrying a lit torch  He opens the front door and inside it is just as dark  He begins climbing the stairs hearing whispers and hushed voices coming from upstairs  The old man waits outside the room where the conversation is taking place and listens on as a snake slithers past him into the room  Wormtail stands in the doorway and looks at the old man who looks terrified  A loud spell is cast and Harry wakes up in a flash of panic flustered and still panicking  Hermione goes over to Ron's bed and they shake hands then walk up the hill  The camera homes in on a boot on top of the hillside and everyone is in a circle putting their hands on the boot  Harry rushes over and puts his hand on the boot and there's a white flash suddenly sending them all flying through the air  Everyone cheers as Harry Hermione and the young Weasleys crash to the ground with a thump while Arthur Amos and Cedric come down more gracefully  Cedric helps Harry to his feet and they walk across the field seeing a massive crowd gathered and cheering with tents set up all over  They walk into the crowd taking in the sights and approach a small tent where Amos and Cedric separate and walk off
